meanings.definition: A person who writes or edits for a journal.
meanings.sent1: The journalizers at the newspaper work hard to report the news accurately.
meanings.sent2: I met a talented group of journalizers at the writing conference.
meanings.sent3: The journalizers decided to have a writing contest for fun.
meanings.sent4: She was a true journalizer, painting stories with her words.
meanings.sent5: The young girl dreamed of becoming a famous journalizer one day.

meanings.definition: To write or edit for a journal.
meanings.sent1: I journalize for a local magazine every month.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys journalizing about her travels in her diary.
meanings.sent3: The students journalized their thoughts after the field trip.
meanings.sent4: He journalizes with passion, capturing the essence of each story.
meanings.sent5: Journalizing allows me to express my creativity through writing.
